name: Pothole Panic (Kokika, KRÉ)
description:
Welcome to Potropolis. Your Team won the competition to manage the ugly potholes in the city's roads. Relax, we know you can do it! Be prepeared for the traffic jam near every pothole. 5 cars in a line means you loose. 

You can assign workers to the pothole by clicking on them. You can zoom in by the mouse wheel, and move the camera by WASD or the arrows, or move your mouse to the edge of the screen!

Have fun and good luck!
